text: 11.13: Ro 16.18; 2 Ko 2.17; Ga 1.7; Fi 3.2; 2 Pi 2.1; VB 2.2Mba gumgi, mbe fhura shɨshɨgap Zisas farasegi ŋaara gumgir wari ga shɨshɨgap, mbe fhura guiguigi ŋaara gumgi ma. Mbe fhura shɨshɨgap wari wo mbui tɨvi domdora suav, gumgi ga mbuim, mbe kha ndɨkndɨgar mben muunga, mbe guigi guarara Krais farasegi ŋaara gumgi guari ma.
